page.title: 06cont'd fron page 5
page.content: The main{vestry}is where the{vicar} gets changed. Upstairs is the{belfry} and the{organ loft.}The vicar,{Frank {A. Chappell,}lives in the{rectory} behind the church. {EVENTS FOR THE WEEK BEGINNING 8.7.85} MON: Holy Communion 7-3opm Mission Communion 8-OOpm WED:;Holy Communion 9-3Oam Standing Committee 7-45pm THURS:Holy Communion 7-3Oam FRI:Garden Party - Rectory 6pm-9pm SAT:Weddings at l2-3O and 2-OOpm Sunday School & Adventurers 9-45am Parish Eucharist lO-OOam Coffee ll-OOam Sunday School picnic at Temple Newsam until 4-OOpm Baptisms 3-OOpm Evensong 6-3Opm
